quote: ...she stood beside him, sagging in his arms, abandoning herself to anything he wished, in open acknowledgment of his power to reduce her to helplessness by the pleasure he had the power to give her.
quote_letters: SHE STOOD BESIDE HIM SAGGING IN HIS ARMS ABANDONING HERSELF TO ANYTHING HE WISHED IN OPEN ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF HIS POWER TO REDUCE HER TO HELPLESSNESS BY THE PLEASURE HE HAD THE POWER TO GIVE HER
